Articles.Content:
Hopefully people have realised i have been building up to this for quite some time...

Start of a full-on series shot from kerbal perspective.

Inspired by Bob Fitches' series change.

So, we have a story line that will develop, feats of kerbal ingenuity and hopefully building some really big impressive things.

So, here is episode 1, the beginning.

Keep an eye and ear open for 'references' to other things none kerbal that will give you hints as to what might be to come.

ToDo:

I need to work on the audio transforms, theirs a bit of distortion that has crept in somewhere.

I forgot to put remote tech on the mods list in the credits at the end... so need to edit that one.

Write a stern letter of disapproval to youtube because some... 'person' has/had a contentID claim for absolute silence...

As always, feel free to comment, suggest improvements. Everything I do, I do for the love and not to profit.

I have two spoiler screencaps for the next episode...

EDIT:

I finally finished off loading the science package into the cargo plane and attempted a drop... It almost killed my PC!

Edited July 7, 2014 by Comwarrior

Here it is Episode 2

I have anew appreciation for those that make role play based video's especially for KSP.

So far to make this video it takes...

1 day script/story line planning.

1 day ship building and testing

1 day shooting video.

1 day rest (very important)

2 days to edit video together and shoot anything missing

1 day to sort out upload issues.

So here it is.

In the next video,

Jeb and Bobs secret mission revelled.

Some developments on kerban...

Apologies for a very long time since video's. Something in my personal life is taking up all of my free time and a considerable amount of money.

However, i have managed to video another behind the sceens episode for you, just so that you can see what it is that i'm going through to produce a video.

This behind the sceens is for setting up an upcoming mun base with fuel generation using the parts i have edited as explained. This is the third base attempt on the mun, the first two had issues and were not easy to do. So each time certain thing got refined to make setup cleaner.

In total it took 8 hours to refine all the rockets, send them up, land and attach for base 3 alone. But, i have compressed it doen to 52 minutes with some nice music when i stop narating.

Please feel free to comment / like. Constructive criticism always appreciated.
